EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin_SystemIntReminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday, February 23 at Pivotal Partner Days, Austin!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend Pivotal Partner Days taking place in Austin.
Below you will find some helpful information about the event:
Location: VMware 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746 Map & Directions <[[https://goo.gl/maps/8eSFEDZNjow]]>
Parking and Building Access: Parking is located in garage 3700. All VMware guests must park directly to the right of the garage entrance.
Upon arrival, please sign in at the 5th floor reception desk. The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to check in.
Space is limited for this event, so if you are no longer able to attend, we ask that you kindly let us know so that we may fill your spot.
Questions? If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart at cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next week!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
